argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ssps.y | |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) |
| 2 |  | ssps.s | |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) |
| 3 |  | ssps.r | |- R = ( .sOLD ` W ) |
| 4 |  | ssps.h | |- H = ( SubSp ` U ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_ssps | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. H ) -> R = ( S |` ( CC X. Y ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_oveqd | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. H ) -> ( A R B ) = ( A ( S |` ( CC X. Y ) ) B ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ovres | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. Y ) -> ( A ( S |` ( CC X. Y ) ) B ) = ( A S B ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_sylan9eq | |- ( ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. H ) /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. Y ) ) -> ( A R B ) = ( A S B ) ) |
